== Announcement ==
On Monday, August 3, 2009 , WordPress version 2.8.3 was released to the public. For information on the security enhancements in this version, see [[Changelog/2.8.3|Changelog for 2.8.3]].  

For [[Version_2.8.3|Version 2.8.3]], the database version ('''db_version''' in '''wp_options''') remained at 11548.

==Installation/Upgrade Information==
To download WordPress 2.8.3, visit http://wordpress.org/download/release-archive/

For step-by-step instructions on installing and upgrading WordPress:

* [[Upgrading WordPress]]

If you are new to WordPress, we recommend that you begin with the following:
* [[New To WordPress - Where to Start]]
* [[First Steps With WordPress]] or [[Upgrading WordPress Extended]]
* [[WordPress Lessons]]
